description: Fast and light Yahtzee variant with player elimination. Plays very quick, so this is not really a problem.

title: Brilliantl...
description: Brilliantly simple game with a fun theme. Yes, it has lots of random luck because of dice chucking, some of the cards aren't super clear, and there is player elimination. BUT I'm willing to take that because its fun and plays quick. There is still enough strategy to scratch the itch and it doesn't overstay its welcome and you get to be a big monster who is whacking other monsters.
Good fun with the kids, it’s a more exciting kind of Yahtzee.  Have to make sure they don’t get mad at each other for ganging up on each other, but it’s a good lesson.

title: Fun dice r...
description: Fun dice roller that takes King of the Hill and Yahtzee and some how makes a coherent game. Fun, but not if opponents decide to play passively.

title: Fun dice r...
description: Fun dice roller that takes King of the Hill and Yahtzee and some how makes a coherent game. Fun, but not if opponents decide to play passively.

title: Love the v...
description: Love the variable powers (from the power up and that you can buy in the game with energy) and the huge handful of dice. A very social game that my boys setup and play with their friends themselves. Lots of laughs and opportunity to gang up on Dad.....

title: Push your ...
description: Push your luck filler with yahtzee-like dice mechanics. Good fun. Simple concepts for kids to pick up. Great art and well balanced power cards.

title: Alright,  ...
description: Alright,  So there isn't much to this game.  But it's kind of fun, and it plays fast.  So yeah, I'll play it, I'm happy to, maybe not a full night of just this or anything, but it's a fun one to start or end on, and my kids love it.

title: A dice-rol...
description: A dice-rolling game which can be fun if in the mood for something light. Rating raised from 5 to 6.

title: A great ga...
description: A great game to introduce non-gamers to a somewhat more complex game.
